extension.summary: Watch NHK World in HD - live stream and on-demand programs
extension.description:
Watch your favorite programs like Japanology Plus in HD with this plug-in.
The plugin is optimized for an Internet connection with at least 10 MBIT. Live stream is typically about 4 MBIT but the on-demand programs require 10 MBIT.
Originally based on Misty's Best Of NHK plug-in (https://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=196657) - his plug-in alsp provides addtional content like NHK on Youtube.
extension.disclaimer: This plug-in is a fan project and not related in any way to NHK!
